name: Merry Crisis (Big Festive Game Jam 2022)
description:
Santa is a little upsetti spaghetti, so it's up to you to make sure all of the presents are ready to go! But beware- there's some cringe little green mean ones coming after your presents. Upgrade your turret to keep them at bay, or just click on the enemies to get them outta here!

Made for the Big Festive Game Jam 2022!

Most of the game was made live on YouTube - The Story Nerd - YouTube

No buttons are needed to play, as long as you have something to click with!
